search_barrel.message: You rummage through the barrel and find some useful supplies.

check_survivors.message: You help a small survivor and gain goodwill.

offer_food.message: Luffy appreciates your kindness and warms up to you.

flatter_luffy.message: Your flattery works — Luffy is flattered and agrees to a trial spar.

join_crew.message: You join forces with Luffy — your courage is rewarded.

decline_crew.message: You decline politely, but the encounter still shapes your journey.

distract_morgan.message: Your distraction works briefly; the marines look away.
